text: The third Jones government was a Labour–Liberal Democrat coalition government formed after the results of the 2016 general election in Wales. On 14 October 2016, Dafydd Elis-Thomas left Plaid Cymru in order to support the coalition government and to give them a ruling majority; he now sits as an independent in the Welsh Parliament. The government was replaced by the Drakeford government on 13 December 2018, following the resignation of Carwyn Jones as First Minister the previous day. == Appointment == == Cabinet == {| class="wikitable" !style="width: 390px"|Office !! colspan="2"|Name !!
